pr_title: SONARJAVA-3517 Rule S5970: Spring's ModelAndViewAssert assertions should be used instead of other assertions

timeline.author: m-g-sonar

replies.bodyText: When using AbstractMethodDetection, we have to rerun the MethodMatchers to known which one matched. I don't expect it to have a huge impact, but I think it makes sense to run it only once.
replies.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource

timeline.author: m-g-sonar

replies.bodyText: As discussed, I agree that this pattern should be used with care. It is acceptable in this case though, since calls to Spring methods will hardly ever occur compared to common assertions.
